original_text: And Shaphan the scribe came to the king, and brought the king word again, and said, Thy servants have gathered the money that was found in the house, and have delivered it into the hand of them that do the work, that have the oversight of the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 서기관 사반이 왕에게 돌아가서 보고하여 이르되 왕의 신복들이 성전에서 찾아낸 돈을 쏟아 여호와의 성전을 맡은 감독자의 손에 맡겼나이다 하고

sentences.original_text: And Shaphan the scribe came to the king
and brought the king word again
Thy servants have gathered the money
that was found in the house
and have delivered it into the hand
of them that do the work
that have the oversight of the house of the Lord
